entry.title: FastForwardTeam/FastForward
entry.summary:
Don't waste your time with compliance. FastForward automatically skips annoying link shorteners.

FastForward

Don't waste your time with compliance. FastForward automatically skips annoying link shorteners.


FastForward has been removed from Chrome Web Store. Join our Discord server for more details about.

About

What is FastForward?

FastForward is the successor of Universal Bypass (see below), a browser extension that can bypass annoying link shorteners, so you don't need to waste your time trying to get on the final link.

You can see the extension in action in our official website.

What happened to Universal Bypass?

As you may know, Universal Bypass is no longer maintained by its original developer, Sainan, who had worked on it for so long.
Thanks Sainan for your hard work.

Does FastForward have a Discord server?

Yes! We do, and if you are interested in assisting the development, need help or just wanna hang out, you can click here to join to our server.

Installing the Extension

Chromium based browsers

Chromium based browsers includes Chrome, Opera, Opera GX, Edge, Brave, Vivaldi.

We recommend installing the extension from the stores below:

FastForward was removed from Google Web Store, if you are not using Edge, you must manually install the extension. See more details in our Discord Server.


Automatic Install

FastForward is present on the Chrome Web Store FastForward is no longer present on Chrome Web Store, see the notice above.

and in the Microsoft Edge Addons.

Manual Install

You can see how to install manually here.

Firefox Based Browsers

This also includes browsers like Waterfox.
We recommend you to install it from the Firefox Addons Store, just click on the image below to be redirected to the store.

Automatic Install

The extension is also on the Firefox Addons Store.

Manual Install

You can see how to install manually here.

entry.title: adrianhajdin/project_music_player
entry.summary:
Master modern web development by building an improved version of Spotify. With a modern homepage, fully-fledged music player, search, lyrics, song exploration features, search, popular music around you, worldwide top charts, and much more, this is the best music application you can currently find on YouTube.

Build and Deploy a Better Spotify 2.0 Clone Music App with React 18! (Tailwind, Shazam, Redux)

Launch your development career with project-based coaching on JS Mastery Pro.
